list.description:
Simple Sight V3

installation:
1. extract UserSight folder into war thunder directory
2. apply under Option > Ground vehicles battle settings > sight settings > reticle

the one with range indicator is for non-laser rangefinder or low velocity shell

based on: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1101996/en/

GI - Ganyu sights for all tanks

#genshin_impact #genshin #ganyu #anime #all_tanks

GI - Xianyun sight for all tanks

Requested by: cluckcluck1111@psn

#genshin_impact #genshin #xianyun #anime #all_tanks

A custom MBT sight, that can be used on all tanks.

Installation: Create a folder for the tank that you want to use it on in the UserSights folder, and drag the .blk file into the folder.

After that, you can select the sight from sight settings menu in the reticle option.

Feel free to edit the sight, for example add custom text.

#mbt #sight #modern #modernsight #abrams #leopard #t80 #t72 #t62 #t64a #t64 #leclerc #ztz99 #wz1001 #strv122 #challenger #type10 #ariete #merkava

Here's a simplified user sight I made and used for years.
Update 2.43 made a huge change in adjustable font size, so now it works for all tanks, and you don't have to create a separate folder to fit each tank anymore.

*NOTE*: As of January 20th, the font size is no longer "self-adjustable" (it remains the same size even if you zoom in), so they look bigger for some tanks with APFSDS and insane zoom (e.g. CV90-120). Not sure if this is a bug and if it will be fixed.

All you need to do is to put the file "2EZ" or the folder "all_tanks" into the "UserSights<...

Historical TZF9B Ost/West Kampf Panzer sights for the new Ost/West Tiger H1s

Edit: Now including the ZF 3x8 optic for the Ostwind 2 Ost

I don't make sights I just use them frequently, figured id post this since I haven't seen anyone else do it. None of the sights are mine. Credit to @Rastmust for the sights

-These are for 1440p resolution if you want the 1080p or 4k versions download the sights from the original post (https://live.warthunder.com/post/1111735/en/) and put into the folders I made in this post.

-There are two version of the sight, a semi historical using the same ...

Realistic sight for french VBCI 25mm

Zip folder contain:
fr_vbci2 folder
Realistic sight for VBCI.

Adapted for on WT:
-display distance correction are not at correct scale, subsequent update for that when i find the correct commands.
-Informations and situations on the sight are dynamic in the real optic. i did the choice fix them in a situation.

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-viseur-personalise/3448

#french #vbci #sight #realistic...

#russia #ru #itp #itpm1 #itp_m1 #plane #collimator #sight #rocket #rockets #rbs82 #rbs

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Gun and rocket sight for the Russian ITP (M1) fighter.

To aim rockets dive around 20 degrees and follow speed guides. The box in the middle is for 600m above 480kmh. Use the outer guides for 300m. Use the lower sights for under 400kmh, and the upper sights for over 550kmh.

INSTALL by unzipping included UserSkins folder to your War Thunder ...

JAPANESE SIGHTS MEGAPACK
Tested on 1080p only

MOST OF THE SIGHTS HAVE BEEN MADE

This pack only contains sights which I've made so far and has a source.
The pack will be updated whenever I make a new sight for a Japanese tank, or if something needs to be fixed.

Gunsight for the US F-89B and rocket sight for the F-89D. Includes both Fixed and Gyroscopic versions, but I strongly suggest only using the fixed sight for now, as the gyro does not move due to a game bug.

To use the rockets, Dive angle is flexible and will work between 10-35 degrees ...
